docs.text:
Installation


Bullet Train consist of 3 components:




The Server-Side REST API.


The Front End Administration Web Interface.


Client Libraries.




To get up and running, you can either use 
https://bullet-train.io/
 for 1 and 2 above, or you can self host the API and Front End. This guide will get you set up self-hosting 1 and 2. Once you have these components up and running, you can add the client libraries to your apps and start managing your features remotely. 


Server Side API


The source code can be found at 
this GitHub project
. 


Front End Website


The source code can be found at 
this GitHub project
. 


Client Libraries


Once you are setup with the front and back end, you can integrate our client libraries with your apps. 




Javascript and React/React Native
 


NodeJS
 


Java

docs.text:
Hosted Service


If you would rather skip the hosting and jump straight to integrating Bullet Train with your own application, you can use 
https://bullet-train.io/
 right now. 


We are going to be bringing paid plans to the service soon, with pricing to suit startups, not enterprise customers.


If you want to discuss hosting options, 
please get in touch
.
